TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ScriptControl : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScriptControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public MustInherit Class ScriptControl Inherits WebControl Implements IScriptControl
public ref class ScriptControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl

summary.span: 提供指令碼控制項的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自類別，並且實作介面。 inherits from the class and implements the interface. 類別是 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的基底類別。The class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls. 是抽象類別，您無法直接具現化。The is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 相反地，衍生類別，根據這個抽象類別。Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class. 基底類別測試的頁面期間控制`PreRender`階段衍生的控制項。The base class tests the page for a control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control. 基底類別也可確保衍生的控制項呼叫方法註冊期間的指令碼控制項`Render`事件。The base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the control to register script during the `Render` event. 這包括註冊物件時方法呼叫。This includes registering objects for the when the method is called. 方法可確保物件不會轉譯，除非本身呈現。The method makes sure that objects are not rendered unless the itself is rendered. 這可讓內關閉工作控制項。This enables a to work inside a closed control. 您可以視需要的任何類別衍生自新增最多的描述項和類型。You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.

returns.span: 包含已註冊為內嵌資源之 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 檔案的 集合。

span.span: An collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.

summary.span: 引發 事件，並向 控制項註冊指令碼控制項。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the script control with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後引發事件的基底類別，方法註冊的指令碼控制項控制項。After the event of the base class is raised, the method registers the script control with the control.

summary.span: 引發 事件並傳送伺服器控制項內容到提供的 物件，這個物件會寫入瀏覽器中所要呈現的內容。

span.span: Raises the event and sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
